attributes.action: Tour Iraq to recieve the public adulation and thanks from a grateful population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime minister has often told us that "the majority of the Iraqi people" think that Iraq is now a safer place.It's only fair that he should tour Bagdhad,Basra and other cities in an open-top bus to allow the grateful Iraqi citizens a chance to publicly show their gratitude.Circumstances allowing the tour could then continue to Gaza and Beiruit.
